services.title: Sakura Plan
services.text: Inspired by the cherry blossom, a symbol of new beginnings. The perfect initial plan that provides the essentials for growth.

items.title: Platforms
items.text: Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok

items.title: Content
items.text: Focus on hooks that capture attention in the first 3 seconds. Use of viral content that encourages interactions.

items.title: Acquisition Strategy
items.text: Setup of a low-budget campaign on Facebook/Instagram Ads to attract interested traffic to the profile.

items.title: Basic Ads
items.text: Low-budget campaign on Facebook/Instagram Ads.

items.title: Monthly Data Analysis
items.text: Simple report of follower growth, engagement (likes, comments, shares), and basic audience analysis.

services.title: Fuji Plan
services.text: Named after Mount Fuji, a symbol of strength. A service that provides greater solidity and marketing structure.

items.title: Covered Platforms
items.text: Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn

items.title: Content
items.text: 20 monthly posts (5 per week), including short videos in reel/TikTok style and graphics to increase reach.

items.title: Advanced Ads
items.text: Retargeting campaigns to maximize conversions from those who interact with organic posts.

items.title: Lead Generation
items.text: Use of integrated forms in ads to capture information from potential clients.

items.title: Profile Optimization
items.text: Review and optimization of bios and descriptions to improve conversion from visitors to followers/clients.

items.title: More Detailed Monthly Analysis
items.text: Reports with key metrics (CPC, CTR, leads generated) and improvement suggestions.

services.title: Bushido Plan
services.text: Inspired by military leaders, represents power and strategic control. A plan for companies seeking strong leadership in marketing.

items.title: Covered Platforms
items.text: Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn, Google Ads.

items.title: Content
items.text: 25 monthly posts, with a mix of educational content, social proof (testimonials, success stories), and high-impact promotions.

items.title: Multichannel Ads
items.text: Setup and optimization of remarketing campaigns and ads on Google and social media focused on conversion and closing sales.

items.title: Sales Funnel
items.text: Creation and optimization of automated sales funnels, from lead generation to final sale, applying principles of scarcity, urgency, and social proof.

items.title: Email Marketing
items.text: Setup of automated sequences to nurture leads, increasing the conversion of those who have not yet made a decision.

items.title: Constant Optimization
items.text: Weekly campaign analysis and continuous adjustment to maximize ROI.

services.title: Tenka Plan
services.text: Tenka means 'under the sky', used to refer to absolute control. This plan represents the utmost dominance in marketing, with all top-tier services.

items.title: Covered Platforms
items.text: All previous ones, plus YouTube and podcasting to generate authority in the industry.

items.title: Content
items.text: Collaboration with micro-influencers and brand ambassadors to amplify reach.

items.title: Influencer Marketing
items.text: Collaboration with micro-influencers and brand ambassadors to amplify reach.

items.title: Aggressive Ad Campaigns
items.text: Significant budget for campaigns across multiple platforms, with constant A/B testing to ensure that the most effective creatives are always active.

items.title: Sales Funnel Optimization
items.text: Sales funnels with intensive tracking and multiple touchpoints, from ads to email marketing, webinars, and remarketing.

items.title: Advanced Data Analysis
items.text: Weekly reports on all metrics, focusing on lifetime value (LTV), customer acquisition cost (CAC), and strategies to improve retention.
